profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.8.3 Artifacts - StructTreeRoot
profile.description: The logical structure of the conforming file shall be described by a structure hierarchy rooted in the StructTreeRoot entry of the document catalog dictionary, as described in PDF Reference 9.6
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The logical structure of the conforming file shall be described by a structure hierarchy rooted in the StructTreeRoot entry of the document catalog dictionary, as described in PDF Reference 9.6

error.message: StructTreeRoot entry is not present in the document catalog
